GSD.description:
xtensa: Fix refcount leak bug in time.c

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.8 by commit 0e403a383c14b63c86bd9df085b7e573e9caee64. For more details please see the references link.
